commit_title: Memoize histogram bounds and display min/max
commit_message: Compute data min/max with React.useMemo (based on data and column) and refactor the histogram bin effect to use these memoized bounds for default start/end and bin size. Add small UI labels under the Start/End inputs to show Data Min and Data Max. Keeps the existing fallback to 0..100 when no numeric data is present.
